verses.roman:
rājāre prabodhiyā bhaṭṭa gelā nijālaya
snāna-yātrā-dine prabhura ānanda hṛdaya

synonyms: rājāre—the King; prabodhiyā—encouraging; bhaṭṭa—Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya; gelā—departed; nija-ālaya—to his own home; snāna-yātrā-dine—on the day of the bathing ceremony of Lord Jagannātha; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ānanda—full of happiness; hṛdaya—heart.
translation: After thus encouraging the King, Sārvabhauma Bhaṭṭācārya returned home. On the day of Lord Jagannātha's bathing ceremony, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was very happy at heart.
